abstract: Neighborhood Joint column profiles Maha Rose Center for Healing in Greenpoint, Brooklyn; center offers array of new age healing modalities and specializes in offbeat and esoteric practices.
lead_paragraph: The Maha Rose Center for Healing has traditional therapies like acupuncture but also crystal bowl sound baths, tarot card readings, spiritual speed dating and more.

headline.main: Maha Rose in Greenpoint Offers Yoga, and Laughter Therapy, Too
headline.print_headline: Yoga, and Spiritual Speed Dating, Too

snippet: The Maha Rose Center for Healing has traditional therapies like acupuncture but also crystal bowl sound baths, tarot card readings, spiritual speed dating and more.
